API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key From @HVApiBot Only

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key From @HVApiBot Only

ALIVE_CHECK_CHAT.description: Put the GROUP CHAT ID where after bot is deployed a confirmation message will be sent.

NORDED_SESSION.description: Put the NORDED_SESSION you got from Xeronoid's GitHub Replit link

DYNO.description: Keep any command prefix as per your needs!

CLEANER.description: Put the value to auto clean the notifications by —••÷[🕊𝗡𝗢𝗥𝗗Σ𝗗🕊]÷••—

CHAT_ID.description: Group chat IDs where your —••÷[🕊𝗡𝗢𝗥𝗗Σ𝗗🕊]÷••— player can play music

NORD_ADMINS.description: User IDs of the Admins you want can use 𝗔𝗱𝗺𝗶𝗻 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀 of Xeronoid
NORD_ADMINS.value: Put like this > 1868088205 1941593018 [with a space between]
